Desc.entry: Local group of a national organisation that organises walks on Sundays, Tuesdays and Wednesdays with occasional walks on Saturdays. Holds a a festival of Christmas walks in December and 3 coach rambles per year. Also encourages the enjoyment of walking at all levels. Has a Walking Out project twice a month with shorter length walks.

Pubs.entry: Programme of events and lecture leaflets; Area News; The Sheffield Rambler (group news)

ContactName.entry: Malcolm Mackay, Membership Secretary/Judy Gathercole, Rambles Secretary
